薟字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薟； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1061第30
【唐韻】良冉切，音斂。【說文】白薟也，或从斂，見蘞字註。　又【類篇】離鹽切，音廉。義同。　又【集韻】虛嚴切，音杴。豨薟，藥草。　又【類篇】魚杴切，音嚴。【字林】水中野韭。　又火占切，音㿌。辛味。　又苦紺切。同餡。味過甘也。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　莶; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1061 to 30
[Tang Yun] Liang Ran cuts, the sound is convergent. [Said the text] Bai Jian Ye, or Cong Lian, see the note of Su characters.　[Classes] Cut from the salt, the sound is low. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Void and strict, sound is not. Siegesbeckia, herb.　[Classes] The fish is cut and the sound is strict. 【Word Forest】Wild Allium in the water.　Fire Zhanqi again, sound 㿌. Spicy.　Bitterness again. Same stuffing. The taste is too sweet.
